text: Panchapaandavar is a 1999 Indian Malayalam film, directed by KK Haridas, starring Kalabhavan Mani and Kasthuri in the lead role. http://www.malayalamcinema.com/gallery_panchapandavar-.htm ==Cast== * Kalabhavan Mani as Sathyanarayanan * Sithara as Yamuna * Vijayakumar as Unnikrishnan * Kasthuri as Nandini * Vijayaraghavan as Kaloorkkadan Balan * Jagathy Sreekumar as Kunjunni * Sainudeen as Lucko * Cochin Haneefa as Kaloorkkadan Varkey * Rajan P Dev as Parameshwara Kurup * Abu Salim as Mustaq * Jagannatha Varma as Achutha Kurup Thirumeni * Mamukkoya as Gaffoor * Spadikam George as Chandrapinny Sunnychan * Tini Tom as Divakaran *TP Madhavan as Kumaran Asan *Mafia Sasi as Musthan * Lissy Jose as Sarasu * Sagar Shiyas as Padayappa Neelakandan *American Achayan as Johnychan *Gayathri as Raji ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Panchapaandavar
